Content.Text:
<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're the new farmer in town, aren't you?
...Your name is <MYNAME>, hmm? I'm Margot.
Charmed.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Note the proper
inflection of both "good" and "morning." Take
notes, if you have to.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Now, did you hear
that? Make sure your greetings are just loud
enough to be friendly, but not overbearing.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hello, <MYNAME>. Note the inflection on the
last syllable of "hello." Take notes, if you have to.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. What brings you
here this late at night?

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'd say good evening, <MYNAME>, but it's past
any reasonable person's bedtime. You should go
home.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. Have you finished
your work yet?

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
What a nice day. So invigorating.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Why does rain have to be so annoying?

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, the sun's certainly out today. I can dry the
laundry faster...in this blistering heat.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I don't like rainy days in summer. They're too
humid. I wish a nice typhoon would cool things
off.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Today's a lovely day, isn't it? Ahh, feel that fresh
air.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Why does rain have to be so annoying?

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That sun's not doing much to heat up the cold
air, is it?

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When I woke up this morning, I wondered where
this cold was coming from. And look. It's
snowing.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I was just telling my son not to go out in this
weather. Why are you setting a bad example?

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I was just telling my son not to go out in this
weather. Why are you setting a bad example?

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...<MYNAME>, I hear you're spending time with
a certain someone these days.
<PAGE>
Not that it's any of my business, but make sure
you don't flirt with your lover in front of my son.
It's not good for him.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
After I send my son to school, I sometimes shop
here.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh my, I should go home and do laundry.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Lutz has been a good boy. Maybe I should bake
his favorite chocolate cake today.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Do you enjoy life on your farm, I wonder?
<PAGE>
I suppose all the fresh vegetables must be nice,
but I know I could never take care of all those
cows and chickens.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. When you were a child, did
you enjoy studying?
<PAGE>
My son studies all the time, without ever
complaining, but does he actually enjoy it?
<PAGE>
Or is he just doing it because I tell him to?

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So you have a dream to expand your farm, is
that right?
<PAGE>
I wonder what my husband's dream might be. I
should know that, of course. But I don't.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. Make sure to take good care
of your family. Sometimes in life, they'll be the
only people you can turn to.
<PAGE>
My husband knows that. That's why he's always
looking after us the way he does.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm strict with my son because I care about him.
I want to help him become a respectable man.
<PAGE>
But then my husband tells me I'm TOO strict.
And...well, maybe I am sometimes...
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, let me ask you... Am I a horrible
mother? And what does it say about me that I
have to ask you that?

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I moved here when I first got married. Before
that, I was working somewhere else.
<PAGE>
I was all wrapped up in my career there, and it
slowly dawned on me that I might be getting too
old to find someone.
<PAGE>
My parents thought so too. Guess they must
have been ashamed, because they tried to set
me up with some random man.
<PAGE>
And when I first saw him, I didn't think much of
him at all. But...well, I have to say he grew on
me. 
<PAGE>
And now, here I am. No regrets, right?

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I know I'm not the most...social person, but
you're never too busy to come and talk to me.
<PAGE>
And you're a heck of a listener. I don't usually
complain, but when you're around, I feel like I
can say anything.
<PAGE>
I think every woman needs someone she can
spill her heart to. So if you don't mind, I'll be
counting on you for that from now on.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Well now, this is my favorite thing. Thank you!
I'll gladly accept it.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, I like these quite a bit. Gratefully accepted.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Well now, this is something I like. Thank you.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is this for me? ...I see. Thank you.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I don't much care for this. ...But since it's a
present, I'll accept it.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
<BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE>...?!
<PAGE>
I hate these more than anything. I'll accept it this
time so it doesn't go to waste, but never again,
do you understand?

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's shining in gold. Gorgeous! Happily accepted.
Let's not give her a present for now.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, what is that? I appreciate the thought, but I
can't accept it at the moment.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I could never take that many presents from one
person. Sorry, but I have to say no.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ah, my very favorite. Thank you! I'll gladly
accept it.
<PAGE>
...What? It's a birthday present?! My birthday
is...today...?! O-oh, is that so...? Th-thanks...

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Huh? A birthday present?! F-for me...?! Th-
thanks.
<PAGE>
Oh, that's <BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE>! I like these
quite a bit. Gratefully accepted.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ah, is this for me? I like it. Thank you.
<PAGE>
...What? It's a birthday present?! My birthday
is...today...?! O-oh, is that so...? Th-thanks...

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Is this for me? ...What, a present for my
birthday?! Th-thank you...

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Well, I'll accept that. Thanks.
<PAGE>
...What? It's a birthday present?! My birthday
is...today...?! O-oh, is that so...? Th-thanks...

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I don't much care for this, but...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>...What? It's a present for my birthday?! Oh, I
suppose today is my birthday. Well, in that case,
I'll accept...

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What...? Today is my birthday...? I'd forgotten
all about it. Thanks.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY><BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE>... Frankly, this is the
worst present ever. Please don't give me
anything like it again.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's shining in gold. What? Is this a present for
my birthday...? Y-you don't say...? Th-thanks.
<PAGE>
It looks so gorgeous! I'll accept it.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I don't like animals. P-please stay away from me!

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I don't like animals. P-please stay away from me!

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I don't like animals. P-please stay away from me!

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I don't like animals. P-please stay away from me!

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I don't like animals. P-please stay away from me!

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I don't like animals. P-please stay away from me!

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I don't like animals. P-please stay away from me!

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I don't like animals. P-please stay away from me!

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I don't like animals. P-please stay away from me!

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I don't like animals. P-please stay away from me!

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I don't like animals. P-please stay away from me!

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I don't like animals. P-please stay away from me!

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I don't like animals. P-please stay away from me!

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I don't like animals. P-please stay away from me!

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I don't like animals. P-please stay away from me!

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
What a beautiful flower. Oh, is it for me?
<PAGE>
Ah, today's the Flower Fair, isn't it? Thank you.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A blue feather...? Why are you showing it to
me?

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A ring...? Why are you showing it to me?

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I like the color of this ribbon. What's inside the
package?

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, is that a present for me? Now I'm curious...

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy birthday, <MYNAME>. ...Here, it's a
present for you. I hope you'll like it.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today's your birthday, isn't it? ...Happy birthday.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, long time no see. ...May I help you?

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, I like those clothes. The design is quite
interesting.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, that's a nice outfit. Black is my favorite
color.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is that workwear? It looks good on you.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm, that's a rather stylish color for farm
workwear.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, you look fancy today. Are you going
somewhere?

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, that's a cute outfit. I like it, especially the
black stockings.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...That outfit is a bit strange, but it looks good
on you.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, you look fancy today. Are you going
somewhere?

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, I like that outfit. It's...what's the word? Ah
yes, "cool."

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's not a skirt, is it?

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is that an ethnic outfit from some other
country? I've never seen that design before.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, you look very formal today... Is there a party
somewhere?

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, that's a nice outfit. Black is my favorite
color.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, that's a nice outfit. Black is my favorite
color.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, you have a stethoscope? When did you
become a doctor?

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, that's a nice outfit. Black is my favorite
color.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, when did you become a maid?

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, when did you become a butler?

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ah, are you working part time for some event? If
so, make sure my son gets a chance to see it.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ah, are you working part time for some event? If
so, make sure my son gets a chance to see it.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, that's a nice hat. Black is my favorite color.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, that's a nice hat. Black is my favorite color.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, what kind of hat is that? I've never seen
anything like that around here.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That hat... It's cute, but it's not technically much
of a hat, is it?

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, now that's a sharp-looking hat.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, what kind of hat is that? I've never seen
anything like that around here.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, you...grew new ears on your head
somehow?

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, I like black-framed glasses. They make you
look smarter.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, I like black-framed glasses. They make you
look smarter.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sunglasses give you a whole different look, don't
they?

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's late at night, so you really should go home
now.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm eating at the moment. ...Have the courtesy
to wait, won't you?

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Those are nice pots. I'd like to put one in my
room, too.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That street lamp is very stylish.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's a waste to put that table outside.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What an interesting statue. Is it some kind of
symbol...?

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a nice fountain. A good place for a break.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That seesaw reminds me of my childhood.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Is there something written on that stone
marker? I can't see it.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Black goes with everything. It's an all-purpose
color. Seems you understand that well.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ever since I was small, I've always found the
color blue to be soothing.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you the one who decorated this place? It's
got a very "spring" ambiance to it.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you the one who decorated this place? It's
got a very "autumn" ambiance to it.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hmm, now how would I go about decorating
my house like this?

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
These autumn flowers on display, are they real?

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This town has become quite the tourist
destination, hasn't it? My neighborhood looks
the same, but now we have shops from all over!

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This town is getting busier, isn't it? I wonder
how all these new traders will affect our
development.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This town feels a bit lonely at times, with so few
stores and customers.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My husband does what he can to help the
town's economy, but it's slow going. Maybe
there's some way the rest of us can help...

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm thinking about sending my son to a bigger
town when he gets older.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This town has grown so much bigger. My
husband's happy to work in the middle of all
these new stores.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like that bench. That's my favorite color.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like that bench. That's my favorite color.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I think that kind of box is for shipping crops...
But you can't ship crops here, can you?

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I wonder what that big pole is used for...

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If my house ever has a garden, I'll add a garden
chair like that one.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If my house ever has a garden, I'll add a garden
chair like that one.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm, a nice plaza. Not a bad place to relax, I
suppose.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's important to have a fire extinguisher handy.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a beautiful light. It feels cold, but I like it
that way.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I wonder who built that small tower, and why...

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This doesn't look familiar at all. Is it a monument
or something...?

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A gentian... That's my favorite flower.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Where did you get blue roses? Aren't those
supposed to be incredibly rare?

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A gentian... That's my favorite flower.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Where did you get blue roses? Aren't those
supposed to be incredibly rare?

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like palm leaves because they always make me
think of the tropics.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That round topiary is the perfect decoration for a
garden, isn't it? If my house ever gets a garden, I
want one just like it.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like palm trees because they always make me
think of the tropics.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like this wood lattice fence. I want one for my
house, too.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
An arch with blue flowers. How lovely.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
An arbor looks more beautiful when it's tangled
with vines.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's something about a black fence that just
radiates class and confidence.
